alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 11:11AM EST until January 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Northwest winds gusting to 25 mph creating limited blowing snow in open areas through this evening. * WHERE...Northern Cayuga and Oswego counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The greater travel impacts are expected this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
